attributes.action: I would like to let Captain Tom Moore receive an honor from the UK Government.
attributes.additional_details: I would like this great person to receive the recognition he rightfully deserves for fundraising over £9,000,000 for our wonderful NHS  in our time of crisis even though he is 99 years old. He is an inspiration to us all.
attributes.background: I would like Captain Moore to receive a title or at least a medal.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
